channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Flex Local Fonts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Flex Local Fonts

item.title: CVE-2021-24782|2024-08-03T19:42:17.321Z -- unknown -- flex%20local%20fonts
item.description: The Flex Local Fonts WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not escape the Class Name field when adding a font, which could allow hight privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
